wikipedia_page.main: Robert James Adams (28 February 1917 – 1 September 1970) was an English professional footballer who played in The Football League for Cardiff City, Bristol Rovers and Millwall.

response: *Bob Adams (1920s pitcher) (1901–1996), American League baseball pitcher

*Bob Adams (1874–1948), one half of American vaudeville duo The Two Bobs
